sentences.english: Bigger isn't better, so skip the huge tomatoes and giant peppers.
sentences.chinese: 越大越差，因此不要選用那些大個西紅柿和大個辣椒。

sentences.english: Heat oil. Add Chng Kee's Sambal Belacan Chilli Paste and stir-fry until fragrant.
sentences.chinese: 用熱油翻炒莊記參芭芭拉煎辣椒醬至香味溢出。

sentences.english: Kate made pasta and roasted red pepper sauce for supper.
sentences.chinese: 凱特爲晚飯做了意式面及烤紅辣椒醬。

sentences.english: No, you won't have to eat peppers that are rated "volcanic" on the Scoville Scale.
sentences.chinese: 當然你不需要去喫火辣辣的辣椒。

sentences.english: Some people like to harvest the plants when the chilies are green.
sentences.chinese: 有些人喜歡在辣椒尚綠的時候收穫辣椒。

sentences.english: Some people like to harvest the plants when the chilies are green.
sentences.chinese: 有些人喜歡在辣椒尚綠的時候收穫辣椒。

sentences.english: Trading Company, which deal with chili , spices, peanuts, gar…
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥公司求購經營辣椒，香辛料，花生，大蒜。

sentences.english: Supply 1 tsp chilli flake, season with salt and pepper. Stir.
sentences.chinese: 加1勺辣椒粉，適量鹽和胡椒，拌勻。

sentences.english: The condiments vary from family to family, but fresh chili powder is a must-have.
sentences.chinese: 調料的口味各家不同，只有現磨的幹辣椒粉必不可少。

sentences.english: In another shallow bowl, whisk the eggs, buttermilk and hot pepper sauce.
sentences.chinese: 在另一淺碗中，打散蛋，混合牛奶與辣椒醬。

sentences.english: It is an Importer and Exporter. Buy dried chili , Dried bean…
sentences.chinese: 美國公司求購幹辣椒，幹豆子，脫水大蒜。

sentences.english: Chilli sauce can titillate our palates.
sentences.chinese: 辣椒醬可以挑逗我們的味覺。

sentences.english: It'll be just perfect with a little chili oil.
sentences.chinese: 如果再加上一點兒辣椒油就再好不過了。

sentences.english: Add more chili peppers and remove from heat.
sentences.chinese: 加入更多辣椒，全翻幾下，起鍋。

sentences.english: The combining ability is important parameter of breeding on high photosynthesis hybrid pepper varieties.
sentences.chinese: 配合力是選育強光合雜交辣椒品種的重要參數。
幹辣椒使我的嘴裏發熱。

definition: same as 朝天椒[chao2 tian1 jiao1]
